EmailTemplate.name: EMEA_Event_PCF Users Group Cocktail Reception_Switzerland_Q418.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: PCF Users Group Cocktail Reception | Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the upcoming PCF Users Group Cocktail Reception at Cloud Foundry Summit in Basel on October 9th. We look forward to seeing you there. To add this meeting to your calendar, click here <[[https://calendar.google.com/event?action=TEMPLATE&tmeid=NzZrNGE4MXFuczJvMjM1cXN1ZmZyajFkcWggbHZvbHBpQHBpdm90YWwuaW8&tmsrc=lvolpi%40pivotal.io]]>.
Date: Tuesday, October 9, 2018
Time:
6:00PM to 8:00PM
Location:
Swissotel Le Plaza Basel <[[https://www.swissotel.com/hotels/basel/]]> Helvetia Foyer 2 Messeplatz 25 4005 Basel (map) <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Swissôtel+Le+Plaza+Basel/@47.5625704,7.5968481,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m7!3m6!1s0x4791b9b98bccf17b:0xc516b4e24ded3fc4!5m1!1s2018-09-02!8m2!3d47.5625704!4d7.5990421]]>
We hope to also see you at Cloud Foundry Summit Basel <[[https://www.cloudfoundry.org/event/eusummit2018/?utm_source=piv&utm_medium=mem&utm_campaign=eu18&utm_content=lp]]>. Find the registration form here. <[[https://www.regonline.com/registration/Checkin.aspx?EventID=2247021&utm_source=piv&utm_medium=mem&utm_campaign=eu18&utm_content=reg]]>
Should you have any questions or would like more information about this event, please email Madison Schlegel at mschlegel@pivotal.io <[[mailto:mschlegel@pivotal.io.]]>.
We look forward to seeing you there!
The Pivotal Team Event Details <[[https://connect.pivotal.io/PCF-Users-Group-Cocktail-Reception.html]]>
